description:
Do you want to design really cool apps and games with zero programming experience and no coding? You are in the right place! You will be amazed how easy and simple it is.

This course teaches you by building three apps: an awesome quiz game, cute puppies, and online training app. Yes - no coding required. You will learn how to publish your project in HTML5 for online viewing on any platform and as an app for Android phones. You can even convert it for iPhone and Windows platforms (Windows 7/8/10, Windows Phone). We will use a really interesting application called Opus Creator that allows you to design amazing apps and games in hours. There is a trial version of this software so you do not have to buy a license to play with it!

This course covers:

  • Overview of Opus Creator
  • Interface and menus
  • Buttons, pages and actions
  • Adding your own graphics and photos
  • Building a quiz
  • Drag & drop features
  • Random questions
  • Layout designs
  • Splash screens
  • Adding video and sound effects
  • Training apps
  • Publishing your app
  • Zero coding required!

Contents and Overview

In over 4 hours of content, including 40 lectures, this course covers all you need to know to start creating your own apps and games for mobile phones. I show you a lot of practical examples and design a fully working quiz game with random questions and drag&drop features.

Join now!
title: How To Build A Mobile App and Game Without Coding
